effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.
